description: The centre-left finance minister fires the first salvo in the race to succeed Angela Merkel.
title: 'Bazooka man' Olaf Scholz in bid to become German chancellor
title_page: 'Bazooka man' Olaf Scholz in bid to become German chancellor - BBC News
maintext: "This is the bazooka that's needed to get the job done," said Mr Scholz. "We are putting all our weapons on the table to show that we are strong enough to overcome any economic challenge that this problem might pose."
